title: "Fixing" High Memory Temps On My Dell RTX 3080...
description: I try and reduce the high memory temps on the RTX 3080 I salvaged from an Alienware system with a couple of very high skill mods.  Get some AWESOME Dawid T-shirts, Mouse pads and more here:   Help us buy weird computers and tech to make videos on by 'Joining' the channel on YouTube here:  Or you can support the channel on Patreon:   *Follow me on whichever Social media you don't hate* Discord:  Twitch:  Twitch bits on YouTube:
